structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS CONCERNING CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS

law.catch_line: Detention in jail prior to trial prohibited for certain offenses, exceptions.

text.section:
No person shall be detained in jail prior to trial for any offense defined in KRS 431.060, 500.080, or 532.020 as a violation unless:
He has previously failed to make a court appearance required in connection therewith; or
Is a fugitive from justice.
This section shall not apply to the offenses listed in KRS 431.015 or 222.202.

law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 336, sec. 6, effective July 1, 1986. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984.
